crypto_elements.implementation: Elliptic curve point operations and scalar multiplication
Elliptic curve point addition with projective coordinates
Binary method scalar multiplication on elliptic curves
Extended Euclidean algorithm for modular inverse
crypto_elements.description: Modular inverse computation for elliptic curve operations

primary_weakness: ECC is completely broken by Shor's algorithm on quantum computers
additional_notes: Elliptic curve cryptography provides strong security against classical attacks but is vulnerable to quantum computers
